motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of December 12, 2022, City Council Meeting Minutes • Approval of December 13, 2022, City Council Special Called Meeting Minutes

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for cyber security discussion.

motions.title: Motion to Amend Agenda to Add Cyber Security Business Item
motions.description: Motion to amend agenda to add business item for cyber security after executive session.

motions.title: Authorization for Contract with Sensato for Cyber Security
motions.description: Authorization for Mayor, City Manager, or designee to execute contract with Sensato in amount of $326,100 and authorize additional funding up to $350,000 for additional devices/expansion using Cybersecurity ARPA II budget.

publicHearings.title: Text Amendment to Chapter 20 Signs (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to Chapter 20 signs with major proposed changes to combine 2 districts and implement Master Sign Plan process. Planning Commission recommended two additional changes at 12/13/22 meeting.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Mario Umana
specialEvents.description: Chief Grogan introduced and Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer Mario Umana. Mayor expressed gratitude for quick resolution of Perimeter Mall incident and acknowledged National Law Enforcement Day.

presentations.title: 2022 Retreat Recap and City Council Goals Update
presentations.description: Update on 2022 City Council Retreat and status of Council goals and actions at six-month mark.

discussionItems.title: Chamblee Dunwoody Road Village Crossroads Project
discussionItems.description: Presentation of Village Crossroads traffic and overhead utility project. ARC awarded city $6M for project, but additional funding needed for major Mount Vernon improvements.

discussionItems.title: Contract for 2023 Pavement Resurfacing
discussionItems.description: Presentation of 2023 pavement resurfacing contract for 15 lane miles. RFP received 5 responses, Blount Construction low bidder at $2,746,210. Staff recommends deferring two optional streets for contingency.

discussionItems.title: Expiring MARTA Bus Shelter Contracts
discussionItems.description: Presentation on two expiring MARTA bus shelter contracts (15-year contract and 6-month extension). MARTA engineers drafted new contracts but city has not reviewed them yet.

notes: Mayor noted Perimeter Mall incident resolution and National Law Enforcement Day
Discussion of tree removal on Tilly Mill Road - Council Member Lambert clarified diseased trees identified by City Arborist
Executive session resulted in cyber security contract authorization
